website_summaries.verdict: A powerful makeup brush cleaner that produces results you can see and feel.
pros: Brushes look and feel clean after use
Bottle will last a long time
cons: Somewhat expensive for what you get

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product before and continue to like it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive and it doesn't clean my brushes thoroughly. I'll stick to using mild hand soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little things are nice touches
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the first time. I had a pile of dirty brushes and this stuff was wonderful. That is not what made me rank it with five stars though. When I opened the package I found a small emery board included. It isn't much, but a little addition like that really makes a big impression. I will certainly order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cowan

customer_reviews.title: mac brush cleanser
customer_reviews.text: ilove this brush cleanser, && ijust love mac products. to me this is a must have! it gets all the color && eyeshadow out of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: jewel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: delivered the product on time and with the expected quality . I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jose Carlos Costa

customer_reviews.title: Alright, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: My feelings on this product are mostly "meh". It works for what it's supposed to do, but I wouldn't say it's outstanding in any way. And the price is way higher than I would like, as with most MAC products. I haven't really tried to branch out to other cleansers, but I may for the sake of my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BEST THING IVE EVER USED FOR CLEANING!!! GETS IT DONE QUICK!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maranda

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE CLEAN BRUSHES.
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR EVERYDAY USE IN CLEANING ALL OF MY EYE SHADOW AND EYE LINER BRUSHES. LESSENS THE POSSIBILITY OF INFECTIONS FROM DIRTY BRUSHES.
customer_reviews.author: KJACOBS

customer_reviews.title: Mac Brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever used Mac brushes to apply MAC makeup especially you know that they are not cheap brushes and you have to take care of them. This is a Great Product to have!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Y. Rooks

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: As a MUA this is one of my best, very convenient n keeps my brush clean
customer_reviews.author: ogee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product..but BUY DIRECT FROM MAC
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyyy overpriced on amazon. You can get it for $13-$14 in store or online direct. That said, this product is worth every penny. I transfer mine to a travel size spritz bottle for immediate cleaning of my eyeliner and shadow brushes. I also mix with water for a biweekly deep clean of my brushes (with spot cleaning every day). I did a test of washing my brushes with my old cleanser and letting them dry...and then did it again with this and so much more crap came out of the brushes that i was grossed out! Have permanently switched to this product
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm3672

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I never gave much thought to how I cleaned my brushes until I saw this product at work. The pigment positively pours out.... It's kind of amazing to watch. My white bristled blending brush comes clean in moments. One bottle lasted several years. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Houston

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot just don't see the difference in using this as opposed to baby shampoo on my Mae up brushes
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: A Cleanser Like No Other ¢3⁄4
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for cleaning make-up brushes!! I've always struggled when it came to finding a great working Brush Cleanser, but once i heard about this product i ordered my bottle, cleaned my brushes, and loved it! I take care of everything i own and my make-up brushes deserve the same amount of respect as my other things. So i am very happy with this Brush Cleanser and encourage everyone to purches and use it!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferdowsi

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great for brush maintenance...
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works well. You can pour a little in a jar and dip your brushes, then blot on a paper towel when you really have to break down some of the long-wearing product formulations that just wash/shampooing alone cannot handle. I like to put my solvent based cleaners (MAC is one of a few I have had) in a small spray bottle. This way I can spray the head of the brush over a clean white wash cloth, and buff the bristles clean. It is a nice way to maintain my brushes in-between wash/shampooing. For solvent type brush cleaner, this is a more gentle cleaner (compared with Parian Spirits for instance).
customer_reviews.author: donmattesso

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL PRICE !! - $13 at maccosmetic online
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculously overpriced. People, please VISIT THE MACCOSMETIC website. It is only $13 !!! I have bought it from mac and it's really good. A decent price ($13 I mean) for 8 ounces, so you get quite a good amount. It's alcohol based and will make your brushes clean really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: PRICING
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time. It works great and lasts a long time. However, DON'T pay this price as it retails in MAC stores and Macy's for $16.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Overpriced on Amazon though.
customer_reviews.text: It's only $15 on Mac.com with Free Shipping. I suggest buying this from there. It works great! I wouldn't switch brands for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Pammie

customer_reviews.title: Love Mac
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, works really good and cleans as is says...
customer_reviews.author: Champagne430

customer_reviews.title: Great Product But Too Expensive!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product around four years ago and it's still halfway full. It does a great job of cleaning my makeup brushes and it doesn't leave any harsh odors on the brush when I pick it up for its next use. However, I give it only 3 stars because it is way too expensive. You can get a similar product much cheaper at your local convenience store. I don't think it's necessary to spend $15 extra dollars on a product just because it is made by MAC even if it does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: AWR
